description:
Join our team of Produce - Travel Retail Merchandisers! In this role, we handle product movement at retail. We display it, we move it, we track it; making sure stores and their product suppliers have the best opportunities for optimal sales. When you join the SAS Retail Services' team as a Produce - Traveling Reset Merchandiser, you'll be making a difference by ensuring the latest products match the newest plan. We've got a lot to offer with specialized training and growth opportunities. This is a traveling position that requires regular travel as a primary requirement of the role. Travel roles may require various degrees of travel up to 50% or more of the time

  • Competitive Wage; $17.50 per hour
  • Paid travel with overnight stays
  • Competitive wages with annual increase eligibility
  • Get paid quicker with early access to earned wages
  • Paid training
  • Growth opportunities- we pride ourselves on promoting from within (FT opportunities)
  • We offer benefits that can be customized to meet your family's needs, including medical, dental, vision, life insurance, supplemental voluntary plans, wellness programs, and online discounts.

Now, About You

  • You're 18 years or older
  • Interested in traveling within and outside of your home state, with overnight hotel stays
  • Have reliable transportation and valid driver's license
  • You can perform physical work of moving, bending, standing and can lift up to 50 lbs.
  • Previous grocery produce merchandiser experience (preferred)
  • 1-2 years of experience working in retail or merchandising (preferred)
  • Must be able to take direction from others
  • Works with in-store leader to merchandiser department in accordance with company standards
  • Work with store management on plano-o-gram execution ensuring retail category compliance
  • Ability to work in a wet and cold environment
  • Ready to jumpstart your professional career and/or fit your lifestyle needs
